@title SafeMath

account.

@param _newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.

attributes.documentation: @dev YHT interface, for mint and transfer earnings.
attributes.name: YHTInterface

attributes.documentation: The Lottery contract for Printing YHT
attributes.name: Lottery

attributes.documentation: @dev make sure only call from Oraclize
attributes.name: onlyOraclize

attributes.documentation: @dev make sure no one can interact with contract until it has been activated.
attributes.name: isActivated

attributes.documentation: @dev prevents contracts from interacting
attributes.name: isHuman

attributes.documentation: @dev check bet value min and max
attributes.name: isBetValueLimits

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "too small, not a valid currency"

attributes.type: literal_string "too small, not a valid currency"
attributes.value: too small, not a valid currency

attributes.documentation: @dev check sender is YHT contract
attributes.name: isYHT

attributes.documentation:
@dev activate contract, this is a one time.
pay some for Oraclize query and code execution
attributes.name: activate

attributes.documentation: @dev check query status, if query callback is not triggered or too later, reactivate
attributes.name: check
getNextOpenRewardTime

attributes.documentation: @dev register query callback for cycle
attributes.name: update

attributes.documentation: @dev if has bet do query random, else to next update
attributes.name: checkQueryRandom

attributes.documentation: @dev set oraclize gas price
attributes.name: setQueryCallbackGasPrice

attributes.documentation: @dev when timeout too long, use tx.gasprice as oraclize callback gas price
attributes.name: setGasPriceUseTx

attributes.documentation: @dev set gas price and try query random
attributes.name: updateGasPrice

attributes.documentation: @dev Oraclize callback
attributes.name: __callback

attributes.documentation: @dev get the query random callback gas cost
attributes.name: getQueryRandomCallbackGas

attributes.documentation: @dev compute the gas cost then register query random function
attributes.name: queryRandom

attributes.documentation: @dev Oraclize query random callback
attributes.name: queryRandomCallback

attributes.documentation: @dev ends the cycle, mint tokens and randomly out winner
attributes.name: currentCycleEnd

attributes.documentation: @dev get mint count per cycle, halved production per 300 cycles.
attributes.name: getMintCountOfCycle

attributes.documentation:
@dev mint tokens, just add total supply and mint extra to founder team.
mint for normal player will be triggered in the next transaction, can see checkLastMint function
attributes.name: mint

attributes.documentation: @dev randomly out winner
attributes.name: randomWinner

attributes.documentation: @dev got winner & dividing the earnings & to next cycle
attributes.name: luckyWin

attributes.documentation: @dev player transfer to this contract for betting
@dev bet with referrer
attributes.name: betWithReferrer

attributes.documentation: @dev use earnings to bet
attributes.name: betFromEarnings

attributes.documentation: @dev bet core
attributes.name: bet

attributes.documentation: @dev check referrer in first bet, only first bet can bind referrer
attributes.name: checkReferrer

attributes.documentation: @dev transfer earnings to referrer if has bind
attributes.name: transferReferrerEarnings

attributes.documentation: @dev get referrer earnings
attributes.name: getReferrerEarnings

attributes.documentation: @dev withdraw referrer earnings if exists
attributes.name: checkReferrerEarnings

attributes.documentation: @dev get player last mint status
attributes.name: getMintStatus

attributes.documentation: @dev check player last mint status, mint for player if necessary
attributes.name: checkMintStatus

attributes.documentation: @dev check last mint used by the YHT contract
attributes.name: checkLastMintData

attributes.documentation: @dev clear warnings for unused variables
attributes.name: unused

attributes.documentation: @dev get last mint informations used by the YHT contract
attributes.name: getLastMintAmount

attributes.documentation:
@dev deposit  
In extreme cases, the remaining amount may not be able to pay the callback charges, everyone can reactivate
attributes.name: deposit

attributes.documentation: @dev withdraw total fees to the founder team
attributes.name: withdrawFee

attributes.documentation: @dev get player bet value
attributes.name: getPlayerBetValue

attributes.documentation: @dev get player informations at once
attributes.name: getPlayerInfos
